text:
I just got a cryptic error message
```julia> @edit Gs[1] + Gs[2]

julia> Inconsistency detected by ld.so: ../elf/dl-tls.c: 481: _dl_allocate_tls_init: Assertion `listp->slotinfo[cnt].gen <= GL(dl_tls_generation)' failed!
julia> 

julia> @edit Gs[1] + Gs[2] # no problem```
is it worth opening an issue? I can't seem to reproduce the error

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
worth for documentations sake at least
